thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Helen

author: Helen
title: Helen
text: I used Airtasker for the first time recently. I had 4 people make offers for my task almost immediately, and I had the job done within the hour by a great tasker. I found the site easy to navigate until it got to the payment, finalisation stage. I would like to see the payment process set out a little clearer. Not changed, but a little easier to find and understand. I did get help and resolution very easily and quickly through the chat window. I'll certainly be using Airtasker again.
